code: 'use strict';var assert=require('minimalistic-assert');var inherits=require('inherits');var proto={};function CBCState(iv){assert.equal(iv.length,8,'Invalid IV length');this.iv=new Array(8);for(var i=0;i<this.iv.length;i++)this.iv[i]=iv[i];}function instantiate(Base){function CBC(options){Base.call(this,options);this._cbcInit();}inherits(CBC,Base);var keys=Object.keys(proto);for(var i=0;i<keys.length;i++){var key=keys[i];CBC.prototype[key]=proto[key];}CBC.create=function create(options){return new CBC(options);};return CBC;}exports.instantiate=instantiate;proto._cbcInit=function _cbcInit(){var state=new CBCState(this.options.iv);this._cbcState=state;};proto._update=function _update(inp,inOff,out,outOff){var state=this._cbcState;var superProto=this.constructor.super_.prototype;var iv=state.iv;if(this.type==='encrypt'){for(var i=0;i<this.blockSize;i++)iv[i]^=inp[inOff+i];superProto._update.call(this,iv,0,out,outOff);for(var i=0;i<this.blockSize;i++)iv[i]=out[outOff+i];}else{superProto._update.call(this,inp,inOff,out,outOff);for(var i=0;i<this.blockSize;i++)out[outOff+i]^=iv[i];for(var i=0;i<this.blockSize;i++)iv[i]=inp[inOff+i];}};
